job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering task of building and maintaining platforms and services, which is a fundamental aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business/domain needs (cybersecurity) and translating them into technical specifications and solutions, which falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration aspect of software engineering, working with other teams to build complete solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers
job_tasks.justification: These are all standard software engineering practices related to code quality, team development, and project delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions leveraging AI models and algorithms to drive a transformation, which aligns with the core task of developing or applying models to solve problems.

job_tasks.phrase: play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the strategic direction of cybersecurity, which requires understanding the business context and aligning technical efforts with strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with different teams, a key aspect of communication and collaboration.
Mentoring involves teaching and guiding, which is a form of communication and collaboration aimed at developing others.

job_tasks.phrase: lead the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform
job_tasks.justification: Leading the development of a new platform implies taking ownership and driving innovation.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Staff Software Engineer, you are not only role models, but also empathic leaders.
job_tasks.justification: Being a leader and role model suggests taking initiative and ownership of team direction and quality.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams
lead the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform
As a Staff Software Engineer, you are not only role models, but also empathic leaders.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks (designing, developing, scaling platforms and services, code reviews, mentoring) which fall under Macro-Category A (1.A.1). While it mentions leveraging 'AI models and algorithms' to transform threat defense, it does not specify tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). The core of the role is building and integrating AI into a security platform, rather than specializing in the AI models themselves. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software engineering responsibilities and mentions AI/ML as a component of the platform being built. However, it lacks specific details about the AI/ML tasks themselves (e.g., types of models, specific AI techniques beyond 'leverage AI models and algorithms'), which prevents a perfect score. The distinction between AI-Adjacent and Core AI Engineer is clear based on the emphasis on platform development.
